flawed_nl_solution:
There are a total of 11 + 1 = <<11+1=12>>12 boys in the class.
Hence, there are a total of 12 boys + 13 girls = <<12+13=20>>20 students in a class.
So 13/20 x 100% = <<13/20 x 100% = 65>>65% of the class are girls.
#### 65

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
